original_text: The Lord gave Lachish into Israel’s hands, and Joshua took it on the second day. The city and everyone in it he put to the sword, just as he had done to Libnah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 라기스를 이스라엘의 손에 넘겨 주신지라 이튿날에 그 성읍을 점령하고 칼날로 그것과 그 안의 모든 사람을 쳐서 멸하였으니 립나에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord gave Lachish into Israel's hands
and Joshua took it on the second day
The city and everyone in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성읍과 그 가운데 모든 사람을

sentences.original_text: just as he had done to Libnah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 립나에게 행한 것과 같이 하였더라
